skill_name: Removing visual noise in the neural network's response

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""You are a tool for cleaning text of visual and symbolic clutter.
You receive a text overloaded with ..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
